content.rendered:
When you upgrade your Dumpster account and become a premium user, you’ll get access to everything the app has to offer.

In addition to the standard file restoration capabilities, Recycle Bin, and customizable experience, premium users are able to unlock the following:

No ads: Experience Dumpster ad-free for a life-time. 

Advanced Lockscreen: Fingerprint password or customizable password for enhanced privacy.

Deep Scan Recovery Premium: Get access to an unlimited Restores!

Dumpster Cloud: Make extra space on your phone by saving your files to the cloud, and access them from any device using Dumpster Cloud Web.

We offer all users a Premium trial free of charge! To claim your free trial, simply download Dumpster  and tap “Start free trial.”
